title: Coinbase surges 37% as BTC pumps and analysts tip strong Q4 results
description:
Coinbase shares have surged ahead of its fourth-quarter earnings call on Thursday, with analysts tipping likely strong trading volumes in the quarter.

Shares in crypto exchange Coinbase have gained 37% over the past week alongside a recent surge in Bitcoin (BTC) andÂ  while analysts expect strong numbers when the firm reports its fourth-quarter results on Thursday.

According to aggregated data from MarketWatch and FactSet, analyst consensus is tipping a strong revenue boost for Coinbase in the fourth quarter, increasing by around 22% from the third quarter to $825 million.

Some of this is predicted to come from strong trading volumes, with analysts estimating a near doubling from $76 billion in Q3 to $142.7 billion in Q4.

title: Citi pilots tokenization of private assets using Avalanche infrastructure
description: Citi's pilot on Avalanche showcases tokenization as a key to unlocking value and operational agility in private markets.

title: Top 20 Shiba Inu Whale Sells $15M SHIB, Buys Retik Finance (RETIK) and Ethereum (ETH) Instead
description: A top 20 Shiba Inu whale has boldly sold $15 million worth of SHIB tokens and invested the proceeds into Retik Finance (RETIK) and Ethereum (ETH) instead. This massive sale and reallocation of funds signal a shift in investor sentiment as confidence in SHIB declines while interest in RETIK and ETH increases.  Shiba Inu Whales […]
